meanings.definition: A set of clothes made to be worn together, typically consisting of a jacket and trousers or a jacket and skirt.
meanings.sent1: He wore his best suits to the wedding.
meanings.sent2: The suits in the store looked very professional.
meanings.sent3: The colorful suits at the party made everyone smile.
meanings.sent4: Her collection of suits was a rainbow of styles.
meanings.sent5: The suits on display caught everyone's attention.

meanings.definition: Be convenient for or acceptable to.
meanings.sent1: The new schedule suits my routine perfectly.
meanings.sent2: This restaurant suits my taste buds.
meanings.sent3: It suits me just fine to stay home tonight.
meanings.sent4: His calm demeanor suits the situation well.
meanings.sent5: The cozy atmosphere really suits this cafe.

meanings.definition: A set of playing cards bearing the same symbol.
meanings.sent1: She had a winning hand with four suits in a row.
meanings.sent2: The deck of cards had all the suits neatly arranged.
meanings.sent3: The suits in the game were all hearts.
meanings.sent4: The suits in the deck were beautifully designed.
meanings.sent5: He collected rare suits for his card games.
